#summary Known Problems with RoadRunner Versions
#labels Featured

= !RoadRunner++ Version 1.0 =

== Build Issues ==
When building the !ThirdParty libraries, the release build flags Ob2 and O2 need to be changed to Ob0 and Od respectively. This is a problem with Sundials CVODE solver. If you don't change these flags, you will get a "Error in CVODE: -4" error when trying to simulate.
